news.markdown:
**MAY-WE-GO-TO-EDINBURGH?** We are taking our multi-award winning show _May-We-Go-Round?_ to Edinburgh Fringe from 5th-14th August, and we need YOUR help! Our Kickstarter campaign is now LIVE! Click [HERE](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thehiccupproject/the-hiccup-project-may-we-go-round) to pledge and support the project. 


**5* REVIEW** for _“It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”_ at [FringeGuru](http://brighton.fringeguru.com/reviews/brighton-2016/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it).

**WINDOW** --- _“It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”_ has been chosen for the [WINDOW Arts Industry showcase](http://www.bn1magazine.co.uk/brighton-fringe-reveals-2016-programme/) as part of Brighton Fringe 2016. The WINDOW Programme is made up of ten shows selected by arts industry experts for the quality of their work.
news.html:

WINDOW — “It’s okay, I’m dealing with it” has been chosen for the WINDOW Arts Industry showcase as part of Brighton Fringe 2016. The WINDOW Programme is made up of ten shows selected by arts industry experts for the quality of their work.

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ at the Edinburgh Fringe 2016**
**9 -- 14 August** --- dancebase --- **[Tickets](http://www.dancebase.co.uk/festival-2016/may-we-go-round-717)**

**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn tour 2016**
**14 October** --- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University
**11 November** --- Pegasus Theatre, Oxford --- **[Tickets](http://pegasustheatre.org.uk/?post_type=shows&p=9905)**
**22 November** --- Exeter Playhouse 
**25 November** --- Barbican Theatre, Plymouth --- **[Tickets](https://www.barbicantheatre.co.uk/event-details/?eid=34426)**
**7 December** --- Mumford Theatre, Anglia Ruskin University --- **[Tickets](http://www.anglia.ac.uk/arts-law-and-social-sciences/mumford-theatre/may-we-go-round)**
